title: Shailey Portfolio — Frontend revert to Draft Version 10 visuals/content

requirements.summary: Revert frontend UI/behavior to match App draft Version 10 by undoing Drafts 11–13 changes.
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed app reflects the exact UI/behavior of App draft Version 10.
No functionality or content introduced in drafts 11–13 remains in the reverted build.
All automated builds/tests (if present) pass after the revert.

file_operations.description: Re-align the main section ordering, rendered components, and any layout/behavior toggles so the page composition matches Draft Version 10 (removing any Drafts 11–13-only sections/props/logic).
Revert Hero section structure/classes/content to Draft Version 10 (including background treatment), removing any Drafts 11–13-only tweaks.
Revert the Selected Signals grid/card composition and per-card rendering conditions to Draft Version 10, ensuring Drafts 11–13-only UI/content paths are removed.
If Drafts 11–13 altered global image interaction patterns, restore Draft Version 10 behavior (hover, link wrapping, sizing) so downstream sections render identically.
Revert any Drafts 11–13 global visual token/style changes (colors, overlays, animations, background/border styling) that affect the Draft Version 10 look and feel.

If this generated asset was introduced/modified in Drafts 11–13 and is not part of Draft Version 10, remove it to prevent accidental reuse. Ensure the Draft Version 10 hero background asset remains available via its original path.

If this generated asset was introduced/modified in Drafts 11–13 and is not part of Draft Version 10, remove it to prevent accidental reuse. Ensure the Draft Version 10 AVAIL card media asset remains available via its original path.

requirements.summary: Restore Draft Version 10 visuals/content for image/media changes (AVAIL — The Nexus Effect card media behavior and Hero background).
acceptanceCriteria: The “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card media matches how it appeared/behaved in Draft Version 10.
The Hero section background matches how it appeared/behaved in Draft Version 10.
No unintended image swap remains anywhere on the site.

file_operations.description: Restore Draft Version 10 media behavior for the “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card (image vs link preview usage, click/hover behavior, sizing/cropping). Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button primitives already in the file; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Restore Draft Version 10 hero background asset reference and visual treatment (overlay, opacity/brightness, gradients), removing any Drafts 11–13-only background swaps.
Audit and revert any unintended image/media swaps introduced in Drafts 11–13 within Selects cards (image sources, open-in-new-tab behavior) to match Draft Version 10.
Audit and revert any unintended image/media swaps introduced in Drafts 11–13 within Experience cards (image sources, open-in-new-tab behavior) to match Draft Version 10.

If Draft Version 10 used different image click/hover behavior (e.g., no new-tab wrapping, different hover scale, or different object-fit), adjust the shared component to match Draft Version 10 so all dependent sections inherit the correct behavior.
